column1: The Pit Room////My son and I did a 10 day road trip of Texas from North Carolina and this was hands down THE BEST meal we had. We arrived pretty early for lunch- around 11:15 and had no wait at all. We ordered a 2 meat combo and one of each taco. Everything was amazing. The brisket was butter- melted in your mouth. The elote was a highlight as well. It was so much food
column2: we took about half with us and ate it for dinner. You MUST visit The Pit Room if you are ever in Houston.
